text: Testing for All is a nonprofit organization focused on providing mass COVID-19 testing to UK residents. The company helps smaller employers and individuals access tests, as well as working with locum GPs in London. In September 2020, the company launched an at-home COVID-19 antibody test for £39. The company is headquartered in London, United Kingdom. == References == == External links == * Category:Health care Category:Virology
title: Testing for All
